parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Tow/Haul mode can cause the vehicle to lose engine braking, leading to overheated brakes, which can result in brake failure, fires, or accidents, especially when descending steep grades.
symptoms: the transmission does not downshift when brakes are applied
the vehicle does not have engine braking
the vehicle is difficult to control when descending steep grades.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to accidents or loss of control, especially when towing a heavy load.
symptoms: and the need to excessively engage the brakes when descending a grade.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadequate engine braking can cause the vehicle to lose control when descending a grade, leading to accidents or brake failure.
symptoms: The transmission does not downshift to provide engine braking as described in the owner's manual
requiring excessive use of the brakes
and potentially leading to brake failure or premature brake replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt anchor can cause the seat belt to detach while driving, increasing the risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seat belt detaches from the wall or anchor point while driving
the seat belt is loose or becomes unbuckled while in use
the seat belt anchor bolt is broken or stripped.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improper installation of the seat belt can cause the seat belt to malfunction or detach, increasing the risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seat belt is loose or becomes unbuckled while in use
the seat belt anchor bolt is broken or stripped
the seat belt detaches from the wall or anchor point while driving.
